turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you help me place an order from Starbucks for pickup in a little bit?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking to get a grande iced caffe Americano.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. and which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on Wall Street in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have u down for 1 grande iced cafe Americano with 2% milk from the Starbucks on wall street. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it, when can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for that is going to b $4.50. did you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 15 mins

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all I needed. I appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, glad to help. have a great day.
